remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用属性，请参阅[关联与 SharePoint 工具扩展的自定义数据](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md)。For more information about using the property, see [Associating Custom Data with SharePoint Tools Extensions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用属性，请参阅[关联与 SharePoint 工具扩展的自定义数据](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md)。For more information about using the property, see [Associating Custom Data with SharePoint Tools Extensions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode AddFolder (string text, System.Drawing.Image folderIcon, Action<Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> createChildNodes);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode AddFolder(string text, class System.Drawing.Image folderIcon, class System.Action`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> createChildNodes) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 要在新的文件夹节点旁显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display with the new folder node.

param.name: folderIcon
param.span: 要在新的文件夹节点旁显示的图标。

span.span: The icon to display with the new folder node.

param.name: createChildNodes
param.span: 执行以为新文件夹节点创建子节点的委托。

span.span: The delegate to execute to create child nodes for the new folder node.

param.span: 当引发新文件夹节点的 事件时，此委托将自动执行。

span.span: This delegate is executed automatically when the event for the new folder node is raised.

summary.span: 创建新的文件夹节点并使用指定委托来为新的文件夹节点创建子节点。

span.span: Creates a new folder node and uses the specified delegate to create child nodes for the new folder node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法来创建一个文件夹节点中，你可以将传递将自动调用，以创建新的文件夹节点的节点的子级的委托。When you use the method to create a folder node, you can pass an delegate that will be called automatically to create the child nodes for the new folder node. 此委托的参数是表示可向其中添加子级文件夹节点的对象。The parameter of this delegate is a object that represents the folder node to which you can add children. 有关演示如何创建文件夹节点时指定的委托的演练，请参阅[演练： 扩展服务器资源管理器显示 Web 部件](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to specify a delegate when you create a folder node, see [Walkthrough: Extending Server Explorer to Display Web Parts](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md).
